actions.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Kildee.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to expand those impacted by major disasters and emergencies to include those working in the areas. Also, extends the grace period for individuals affected by a major disaster or emergency to up to 6 months.
purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to expand those impacted by major disasters and emergencies to include those working in the areas. Also, extends the grace period for individuals affected by a major disaster or emergency to up to 6 months.
